summary:
1984 - 1997 "Off the Wall" Trendshop, sports- & casual clothes
                 + shops in The Hague, Leiden & Zandvoort
1985 -1991 "Off the Wall" Motocross gear
1991 - 1992 Start 1st Dutch ‘House-Parties’ Rave the City (up to 14.000 vistitors)
1993 - 2000 Events organised in int.famous clubs in Ibiza
1996	- 2 march ’96 TMF Mega Dance Music Factory 
1994 -  1998 American Restaurant, dance-theme-café "Road to Paradise"
Music label Exposure DanceMusic, production, marketing & sales own mix CD compilations
1992 - 2005 Club Exposure, Discotheque Sandokan & Club Fly
Exposure Agency: international artist & DJ agency
2001 - 2005 Projectmanager Bevasta Vastgoed & Project development (project- & real estate management)
2005 - current: 2ndHomes - International Real Estate

--------------------------------
2011-2012 - Goals: 
1. Expand international network Authorized 2ndHomes Dealers
(looking for Belgium, German, UK, China & Russian agents)

2. 2ndHomes Global Investments & Finance (private investment fund offering project finance for a variety of projects worldwide) 

3. Opening rep offices 2ndHomes in Miami, London, Brazil, Singapore & Thailand

2013 - Goals: Start to franchise 2ndHomes International

Specialties: Marketing & Sales
Organisation
Development
Management
Creative design

The villas in Hua Hin Laguna are designed to meet European standards, as in high ceilings and double walls separating the lounge from the entrance hall to assure privacy. More info: http://www.2ndhomes.nl/details.aspx?id=1267&seq=AAST-0098-jhgG", 'image': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/sync/C4E27AQG1kU8VPQ46Bg/articleshare-shrink_800/0/1691062099969?e=1692957600&v=beta&t=RT4IOwbppVhmM3qBOWWs0gsnEGp9o-j5KASpLaIVGBg'}, {'url': 'https://www.slideshare.net/renemulder/2nd-homes-int-company-brochure', 'title': '2nd Homes International Company Brochure', 'description': "2ndHomes International Company Brochure - International Real Estate - Authorized 2ndHomes Dealer - Financial Services
2ndHomes is a sales organization of International Real Estate in varying beautiful & special parts of the world. Special because of certain characteristics, environments, projects and by interesting capital gains and high R.O.I. of these areas. Mainly targeting new, upcoming areas or emerging markets, specializing in Bali, Brazil, Thailand, Cyprus, Ibiza, Panama and USA (a.o. Trump projects).
With an extensive worldwide portfolio guiding and advising clients during the difficult process of buying international real estate, we're supported by our local rep offices, partners and an international increasing nr. of 2ndHomes authorized dealers.
Offering interesting 'Lifestyle investment opportunities' and holiday homes with great pre- and after sales services is part of the strategy that enables us to be the fastest growing sales organization in the industry. Being co-developer in some cases as well we are now also developing the astonishing luxury eco-friendly villa resort 'Bukit Manis' in Bali.
Our new Financial Services division offers an auxiliary range of alternative funding sources, bank instruments & mortgage services in 50 countries!", 'image': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/sync/C4D27AQH-yCvdxfWOtw/articleshare-shrink_800/0/1691062099786?e=1692957600&v=beta&t=KWZAqVB_5QT4vHZxIwAcQP1I2y0A-ILXqZT39ELGWgg'}, {'url': 'https://www.slideshare.net/renemulder/brochure-flex-building-bali-uk-version', 'title': 'Brochure Flex Building Bali', 'description': 'Brochure construction concept Flex-Building-Bali', 'image': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/sync/C5127AQELX1_Lt3qkbg/articleshare-shrink_800/0/1691062100855?e=1692957600&v=beta&t=-sAEF_j4KEs0lZPVQvFHwjc6NYyXRDrakd9wKLta6ow'}, {'url': 'https://www.slideshare.net/renemulder/brochure-bukit-manis-uk', 'title': 'Brochure Luxury Villa Resort Bukit Manis - Bali', 'description': "Brochure from our Luxury Villa Resort Bukit Manis (will also be copied in Brazil, Ibiza, Thailand, Malaysia, &  Mexico)
This wonderful new luxury project is a jewel in one of the most beautiful areas in the Bukit-often called the Beverly Hills of Bali-(South Bali), very close to National Park GWK (Garuda Wisnu Kencana), Bvlgari and the Four Seasons Hotel. Situated in a quiet coastal area and is surrounded by expatriate community. It's a development of 2ndHomes in cooperation with Exposure Project Development, thus in Dutch hands. 
We build 2 type of Balinese villas (total 24: 12 one storey and 12 two storey villas) with a big central 'open living', Infinity Pools and unobstructed Indian Ocean views to taste the unique Balinese way of life. Only 13km from the international airport and 1km from Dreamland beach & Golf. The closest beach (Greenball) is just a min. from the resort which is a true paradise to real Bali lovers. 
Also close to the Jimbaran famous beach fish restaurants, Nusa Dua & Tanjung Benoa harbor.
Situated in a area where tourism is hardly present yet to be able to enjoy the quietness of the beautiful surroundings. And yet close enough to reach all other facilities with a 15 min. drive, which is very convenient for rentals. The project will be delivered with Free-Hold title to secure your ownership rights. A true Balinese beauty in its kind...!
More info: http://www.2ndhomes.nl/details.aspx?id=1138&seq=AAST-0098-jhgG", 'image': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/sync/C5627AQE3qBu5z3ZtpQ/articleshare-shrink_800/0/1691062101138?e=1692957600&v=beta&t=BdKvQQ3hL9H9U4Llyi-AJtluXcWCafVQl2p1kxP-Ono'}]
